articles.title: UK needs 'citizens' army' to tackle invasion of alien species, MPs warn
articles.description: After Brexit threat of invasive species will rise as trading routes open up with South America and Asia
articles.content:
The UK needs a citizens army to tackle the threat of dangerous pests and diseases which could cost the economy £1.8bn a year, MPs have warned. 
Current funding for biosecurity is estimated to be £220m a year but invasive species projects receive less than 1 … [+5795 chars]
